text: Thriller 25 is the 25th anniversary edition reissue of American singer and songwriter Michael Jackson's iconic album Thriller, which was originally released in 1982. The reissue, released in February 2008, included remastered versions of the original tracks, as well as several bonus tracks. These bonus tracks featured remixes and collaborations with contemporary artists, breathing new life into the classic songs. The album featured hits like "Billie Jean," "Beat It," and the title track "Thriller," which is known for its groundbreaking music video. Thriller is often hailed as one of the greatest albums of all time and has had a significant impact on pop music and culture. In addition to the music content, the Thriller 25 reissue was accompanied by various promotional efforts, including performances and events to celebrate Michael Jackson's legacy and the enduring popularity of the Thriller album.
title: Thriller 25
